title: Educational Curriculum for Template-Based Instructional Software Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in educational content planning
context.additional_context: A process to enhance language education software development capabilities using template-based authoring tools in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement one interactive content for language education using template-based authoring tools.
Learners can apply instructional design principles (guidance, feedback, assessment) considering educational effectiveness to software.
Learners can integrate a project-based assessment system suitable for small learner groups into software.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
